<title level="1" right="Rules">[Worn Items](/Rules.aspx?ID=3226)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 284 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
This section includes magic items you wear. Most have the [invested](/Traits.aspx?ID=637) trait, which means you can wear no more than 10. Armor appears in its own section [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=3169), high-level apex items that can increase ability modifiers are [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=3208), and worn items for pets appear [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=3209).

[Click here for the Worn Items category page](/Equipment.aspx?Category=41).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
